title: Last Week in Slovakia: President and government clash over expelling Russian diplomats
itunes:author: The Slovak Spectator
itunes:summary:
President Andrej Kiska and the Foreign Ministry have their differences about the issue of expelling Russian diplomats from Slovakia in the wake of the Skripal Case. 
Prosecutor confirmed murder of journalist and his fiancee was ordered, the police say they have tracked the moves of the perpetrator. 
Uber is finished in Slovakia. 

This programme is part of The Slovak Spectator subscription and our readers are receiving it every Thursday morning as part of their subscription. 
More information:
Print+audio: shop.spectator.sme.sk/newspaper 
Online+audio: www.sme.sk/predplatne-spectator/

description:
President Andrej Kiska and the Foreign Ministry have their differences about the issue of expelling Russian diplomats from Slovakia in the wake of the Skripal Case. 
Prosecutor confirmed murder of journalist and his fiancee was ordered, the police say they have tracked the moves of the perpetrator. 
Uber is finished in Slovakia. 

This programme is part of The Slovak Spectator subscription and our readers are receiving it every Thursday morning as part of their subscription.
